name: Blundstone Leather Lined 1936 Lace Up Boots - Unisex
description: Classic Blundstone comfort with a few strings attached. If you like to cinch in the perfect fit, the Leather Lined 1936 Lace Ups are for you. A supple leather lining elevates the comfort factor, making these boots a sure-fire favourite.Weatherproof leather upper, lined with leather for a softer and more durable wearing experience.Thermo-polyurethane sole is highly abrasion-resistant and provides exceptional traction even in Canadian winters.PORON® XRD™ impact absorption in the heel offers all-day comfort.Pull loop for extra leverage.Round toe, medium width.These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size.
